name: N/A - In-Market Streaming
description:
1. Connect iPhone and iPad to Charles Proxy
2. In Prod or QA, make sure media_on Root Feed(s) setup for HOU, COL, PIT, SEA
3. Go to the Team Page of HOU, COL, PIT, SEA
4. Look for the blackouts json: https://content.mlb.com/data/blackouts/10011.json
5. Right click and remote map the blackouts file
6. Use the Remote Map settings
Map From - the copied blackouts file
Map To - blackouts file with updated zip code of in-market area

ROOT Sport Creds: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DI/pages/3736010/ROOT+Sports+-+Adobe+Activation#ROOTSports-AdobeActivation-MVPDTestAccounts
